entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:07 p.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
